title: Far Cry 5: Gold Edition – v1.011 + 5 DLCs
body:
Far Cry 5: Gold Edition – v1.011 + 5 DLCs


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, Open world, First-person, 3D
Companies: Ubisoft Entertainment & Family
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI15
Original Size: 83.4 GB
Repack Size: from 21.8 GB [Selective Download]

 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet] ENG/RUS Only
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: Good Old Downloads (NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Far.Cry.5.Dead.Living.Zombies-CODEX release: codex-far.cry.5.dead.living.zombies.iso (86,570,106,880 bytes)
  • Missing French localization (2.8 GB) added, thanks to Nymriel
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Game version is v1.011; 5 DLCs included and activated
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of Dead Living Zombies DLC (coupled with in-game editor files), HD Textures Pack and voicepacks you don’t need
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 83.4 to 21.8~52.5 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 30-90 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 93 GB
  • Use “Language Selector.exe” in game “bin” folder to change the menu language, subtitles and audio settings has to be changed in game options
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack
  • ATTENTION! If you’re installing this repack under Windows 10, run setup with compatibility set to Windows 7

Game Description

Far Cry comes to America in the latest installment of the award-winning franchise.

Welcome to Hope County, Montana, land of the free and the brave but also home to a fanatical doomsday cult known as Eden’s Gate. Stand up to cult leader Joseph Seed, and his siblings, the Heralds, to spark the fires of resistance and liberate the besieged community.

FIGHT AGAINST A DEADLY CULT
Free Hope County in solo or two-player co-op. Recruit Guns and Fangs for hire to help defeat the cult.

A WORLD THAT HITS BACK
Wreak havoc on the cult and its members but beware of the wrath of Joseph Seed and his followers.

CARVE YOUR OWN PATH
Build your character and choose your adventure in the largest customizable Far Cry game ever!

DYNAMIC TOYS
Take control of iconic muscle cars, ATV’s, planes and a lot more to engage the cult forces in epic fights.

Included DLCs

  • Lost on Mars
  • Hours of Darkness
  • Deluxe Pack
  • Dead Living Zombies
  • HD Textures Pack

You can skip downloading of in-game editor files and voiceovers packs you don’t need. Here is the list of selective/optional files:

  • fg-optional-zombies-and-editor.bin (though in-game editor doesn’t work in cracked game, those files are required for Dead Living Zombies DLC to work)
  • fg-optional-hd-textures.bin (you need it only if you want to play with Super HD textures)
  • fg-selective-speech-brazilian.bin
  • fg-selective-speech-english.bin
  • fg-selective-speech-french.bin
  • fg-selective-speech-german.bin
  • fg-selective-speech-italian.bin
  • fg-selective-speech-japanese.bin
  • fg-selective-speech-russian.bin
  • fg-selective-speech-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with German UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “selective” files, but download fg-selective-speech-german.bin & all main files (01-13).

Backwards Compatibility

This repack is partially backwards compatible with my previous repack of FC5. You can rehash fg-03.bin, fg-04.bin, fg-05.bin and fg-06.bin files to save ~2 GB of traffic.
